TEAM CENTS

Our team has designed & built interactive education courses, e-commerce sites, even Samsung's Galaxy S4. Together, we're devoted to changing the world through design. How can we help you?

Frank Taylor
Founder/Product Designer

Frank grew up in the rural green mountains of Vermont before heading to Syracuse University where he studied political science & international relations. There, he createdCentscere - a fundraising software that automates donations via Facebook and Twitter - and has raised thousands for nonprofits.

Sterling Forest
Founder/Software Architect

Sterling is Cent's Chief Software Architect. Before making the cross-coast trek from San Francisco to NYC, Sterling studied computer science & mathematics at UC-Santa Cruz and worked for Versal. At Versal, he independently built complex front-end interfaces & interactive education courses.

Thomas Hyung Jung Kim
Founder/UX Designer

Thomas is Cents' Senior UX Designer. Before Cents, he worked for eight years in Seoul at Samsung Electronics on the Galaxy Series. Thomas studied Animation at The School of Visual Arts and Interactive Media at New York University.

Adam Matula
Founder/Content Manager

Adam heads marketing and manages Cents's global nonprofit parternships. After getting his M.A. in Journalism from Syracuse University, Adam was a reporter for Elite Daily. He often gets caught tracking the Brooklyn police blotter to photograph crime scenes.

Daisy Ramos
Founder/iOS Developer

Daisy is a native New Yorker with a passion for software and the Internet of Things. Before joining Cents, she obtained a B.S. in Computer Science and Physics at the City University of New York, Queens College.
